q:
In data structures, what is the time complexity of the following code in which the size of the array hack is \(N\):

int hacksearch(int hack[], int a, int b, int key)
	if (a > b)
		return -1
	int mid = (a + b) / 2
	if (hack[mid] == key)
		return mid;
	if (hack[l] <= hack[mid]) 
		if (key >= hack[l] && key <= hack[mid])
		  return search(hack, a, mid - 1, key)
	  return search(hack, mid + 1, b, key)
	if (key >= arr[mid] && key <= hack[h])
		return search(hack, mid + 1, b, key)
	return search(hack, a, mid - 1, key)
